I

IBistable - Interface in UserCode.Behaviours
IBistable: a two-state variable; essentially a bi-stable 'flip-flop' (or two-element state machine).
IDisplayObject - Interface in Framework.Interfaces
The IDisplayObject instance contains all the data for displaying something by an IWorld instance.
IDumbVariable - Interface in UserCode.Behaviours
IDumbVariable: interface for a variable without any behaviour - just mutation.
IEventListener - Interface in UserCode.EventHandling
IInputListener: all listeners for input must implement this interface.
IEventPublisher - Interface in UserCode.EventHandling
IEventPublisher: publishes input events to all listeners.
IGameMgr - Interface in UserCode
All top-level game classes must implement IGameMgr.
IInput - Interface in Framework.Interfaces
IInput implementations access input from Env3D.
IInputHandler - Interface in UserCode.InputHandling
IInputPublisher: publishes input events to all listeners.
ILinearVariable - Interface in UserCode.Behaviours
ILinearVariable: a 'smart' variable with a linear change, which changes direction when it reaches the upper or lower limit.

ISpawnable - Interface in UserCode.Spawnables
Any object that can be spawned must implement ISpawnable.
ISpawnableFacade - Interface in UserCode.Game
ISpawnableFacade - a facade to any ISpawnable used in the game.
ISpawnablePool - Interface in UserCode.Behaviours
ISpawnablePool - an object pool of specific ISpawnables having the same parameters, used to implement a particle system.
IUpdatable - Interface in Framework.Interfaces
Any object that needs to be updated in an update loop should implement IUpdatable.
IUpdatableFactory - Interface in UserCode.ObjectCreation
IUpdatableFactory interface - all implementations can create instances of IUpdatable.
IVariable - Interface in UserCode.Behaviours
IVariable: the top level interface for any smart 'variable'.
IWorld - Interface in Framework.Interfaces
IWorld implementations provide the virtual world functionality for the simulation.
